criteria: E2E test for user registration and login is passing. All core calculator component tests are passing. Initial Axe scan shows zero critical violations.
success_metrics: User can successfully create an account and log in. Core calculator is functional.

criteria: E2E test for persistent history is passing. E2E test for creating a custom mode via the wizard is passing. Help modal integration is functional.
success_metrics: All key deliverables for data persistence and custom mode creation are demo-ready.

criteria: Security review for the sandbox Lambda is approved. API integration tests for the execution endpoint are passing. Unit tests for the offline queuing service achieve >90% coverage.
success_metrics: No critical security vulnerabilities found. Offline framework is robust and testable.

criteria: Full WCAG 2.1 AA audit is passed. All offline synchronization E2E tests are passing. Performance benchmarks for custom mode execution are met. No P1 or P2 bugs remain open.
bypass_criteria: Formal sign-off on accepting specific P2 bugs as technical debt.
success_metrics: Application is fully compliant, performant, secure, and ready for release.
